page.title: 16RECREATION
page.content: MANY PEOPLE WATCH THE POPULAR SPORTS RUGBY,SOCCER AND CRICKET WHILE MANY ARE ACTIVE PARTICIPANTS IN THESE SPORTS TOGETHER WITH TENNIS,SQUASH, SWIMMING AND JOGGING. THERE ARE MANY LOCAL RUGBY, SOCCER AND CRICKET TEAMS.MANY PEOPLE PLAY FOR THESE TEAMS WHILE OTHERS ENJOY WATCHING.NEATH TOWN IS FAMOUS FOR ITS RUGBY TEAM WHO PLAY IN AN ALL BLACK KIT WITH A WHITE MALTESE CROSS. THEY ARE THE OLDEST WELSH FIRST CLASS TEAM AND CELEBRATED THEIR CENTENARY IN 1971-72 SEASON.TENNIS,SWIMMING,GOLF, SQUASH AND JOGGING ARE OTHER ACTIVITIES ENJOYED AND THE GROWTH OF LEISURE CENTRES ALLOWS A CENTRALIZATION OF MANY INDOOR AND OUTDOOR ACTIVITIES.AT HOME PEOPLE ENJOY T.V. AND VIDEO WHILE THE INCRASE IN THE NUMBERS OF HOME COMPUTERS ADDS A NEW DIMENSION TO INDOOR RECREATION.
